metadata.title: World of Beauty and Harmony
metadata.description: Welcome to the World of Beauty and Harmony with Solomonik Alena, a cosmetologist from Katzrin, Israel.
metadata.keywords: Beauty, Harmony, Services, Solomonik Alena, Confidence, Cosmetologist, Israel, Golan Heights

home.subtitle: Welcome to the World of
home.title: Beauty and Harmony!
home.desc: Hi! I'm Alena, a cosmetologist. My goal is to help everyone reveal their natural beauty and gain confidence. A personalized approach allows me to highlight unique features and achieve harmony. With me, you are in for a journey into the world of beauty.
